mods.abstract: Statue of an official (Old Kingdom Dynasty V) at the Gizeh Museum; wood statue with detachable limbs wears kilt and stylized cropped curled wig, passive face, bare feet; freestanding statue stands upon fractured pedestal; statue in shadows in niche (background); "204 (Mus: de Ghiseh...d'un Secretaire...Ank...J.P. Sebah", in white, bottom right corner of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

mods.note: Gift of the Friends of Egyptology, McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture, The University of Tennessee
